product_name: Sierra Designs Fast Pitch Kit with Jake's Foot - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Transform any tent with Jake's Foot corners into an ultralight footprint / fly shelter with this Fast Pitch Kit for minimalists looking to shave ounces on summer backpacking treks.
